elements.name: intro_hastings
elements.html:
Built in 1961, Hastings Middle School has had several additions over the years, most recently in 1978.

Earlier this year, a team of engineers and architects identified the following challenges with the building:

  • Roof, HVAC system, windows, and flooring need replacement.
  • Lighting, plumbing, electrical, and security systems need repair or replacement.
  • Many classrooms are smaller than state-recommended sizes; athletic spaces and music rooms are also too small. There are few spaces where students and teachers can work in small groups.
  • Old HVAC units in classrooms make it hard for students to hear.
  • Science labs and safety equipment are outdated.

Here are three ways that the UA School District could address these issues.

Each option is shown below in full. Click Evaluate this option under any box to share your opinion.
